body: @nkean97 what method did you use to install beta.9? I'm not able to reproduce this issue using brew or compiling from source. https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/installation/linux.md#macos-1012

I thought I used brew but maybe I did something really strange over the weekend.  I just followed the steps for uninstalling via brew and direct link.  I think reinstalled via brew and now it doesn't require 'sudo' to run.  Thanks for the help.


Norman Kean

703.483.3949 (Home)

419.377.1833 (Cell)
